1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Class for constructing mix text.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.MixText.MixClass
7  ( -- * Class
8    Mix (..),
9
10    -- * Mix utility
11    mixBracket, mixBracketS,
12    mixJoin, mixJoinS,
13    mixJoin1, mixJoinBar,
14    mixInfix,
15  ) where
16
17import Data.Monoid ((<>))
18import qualified Data.ByteString                         as Bs
19import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy                    as Bz
20import qualified Data.Text                               as Tx
21import qualified Data.Text.Lazy                          as Tz
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.MixText.MixText    as B
23
24
25-- ----------------------  Construct
26
27-- | Construct mix text.
28class Mix a where
29    mix :: a -> B.MixText
30
31-- | Mix text itself.
32instance Mix B.MixText where
33    mix = id
34
35-- | Create empty mix text.
36instance Mix () where
37    mix _ = B.mixEmpty
38
39-- | Create mix text from strict bytestring.
40instance Mix Bs.ByteString where
41    mix = B.mixBs
42
43-- | Create mix text from lazy bytestring.
44instance Mix Bz.ByteString where
45    mix = B.mixBz
46
47-- | Create mix text from strict text.
48instance Mix Tx.Text where
49    mix = B.mixTx
50
51-- | Create mix text from lazy text.
52instance Mix Tz.Text where
53    mix = B.mixTz
54
55-- | Create mix text from string.
56instance Mix String where
57    mix = B.mixString
58
59-- | Create mix text from char.
60instance Mix Char where
61    mix = B.mixChar
62
63-- | Create mix text for integer.
64instance Mix Int where
65    mix = B.mixDec
66
67-- | Concatenate mix text.
68instance Mix [B.MixText] where
69    mix = mconcat
70
71-- | Extract mix text or empty if nothing.
72instance Mix (Maybe B.MixText) where
73    mix (Just m)  = m
74    mix (Nothing) = B.mixEmpty
75
76
77-- ----------------------  Utility
78
79-- | Enclose mix text with open and close bracket.
80mixBracket :: (Mix m) => (m, m) -> B.MixText -> B.MixText
81mixBracket (open, close) body = mix open <> body <> mix close
82
83-- | Enclose mix text with bracket and space.
84mixBracketS :: (Mix m) => (m, m) -> B.MixText -> B.MixText
85mixBracketS (open, close) = mixBracket (mix open <> B.mix1, B.mix1 <> mix close)
86
87-- | Concatenate mix texts with delimiter.
88mixJoin :: (Mix m) => m -> [B.MixText] -> B.MixText
89mixJoin delim = loop where
90    loop (x : xs) | null xs   = x
91                  | otherwise = x <> mix delim <> loop xs
92    loop []                   = B.mixEmpty
93
94-- | Concatenate mix texts with delimiter and space.
95mixJoinS :: (Mix m) => m -> [B.MixText] -> B.MixText
96mixJoinS delim = mixJoin (B.mix1 <> mix delim <> B.mix1)
97
98-- | Join with one space.
99mixJoin1 :: [B.MixText] -> B.MixText
100mixJoin1 = mixJoin B.mix1
101
102-- | Join with vertical bar.
103mixJoinBar :: [B.MixText] -> B.MixText
104mixJoinBar = mixJoinS "|"
105
106-- | Insert infix text.
107--
108--   >>> mixInfix "-" (mix "12") (mix "34")
109--   MixText "12-34"
110--
111mixInfix :: (Mix m) => m -> B.MixText -> B.MixText -> B.MixText
112mixInfix inf l r = l <> mix inf <> r
113
